item.title: Solo - Time Tracking & Invoicing
item.description:
Solo will be available shortly on AppStore!


Solo is simple and comfy solution for individual professionals who needs to track time and bill clients with clean and clear invoices. Solo time tracker is focused on simplicity and autonomy: no registration or additional configuration required. Start instantly. Work without any distraction. Charge client in 3 taps.

Great features we believe you will like:

  1. Dead simple history. You can see how much time you spend each day and how much money you earn. No complex charts. No tiny numbers. Everything is easy to read and analyse.
  2. Multiple timers running concurrently. You want to consult two clients and charge them separately? Maybe you are working with one client and stuck in queue and have time to do some calls to help other client? No problem. With Solo time tracker you can have multiple timers running at the same time.
  3. Fast and simple controls. You can start timer in one swipe. You can mark invoice as paid in one swipe. Everything is fast and easily accessible.
  4. Add or edit time records. You can add time records or edit existing ones if you need. Actually you can generate whole invoice based on records you added manually. It is premium feature.
  5. Track invoice status.
  6. Handy notifications. Never forget to start tracking time. Never forget about active timers.

There are even more features. Download Solo and try yourself!
